Intent: Turn off both Samsung TVs using audio mute and switch on the fireplace light using available meross-Light-Strip devices.  
Signals: Command specifies turning off all TVs and switching on the fireplace light; both TVs are currently on, and the light strips are off.

environment_overview:
1) The detected devices include two Samsung TVs: the Samsung The Frame (49) and the Samsung 8 Series (82), both capable of audio control and media playback. Additionally, there are multiple meross-Light-Strip devices that can be controlled for lighting purposes. A c2c-switch device is also present, which can be used for switching actions. The TVs are located in a media area, while the light strips are likely positioned in a living or decorative space.

2) The current state of the Samsung The Frame (49) and Samsung 8 Series (82) TVs is "on," with both capable of audio volume control and media playback. The TVs can be muted to effectively turn them off. The meross-Light-Strip devices are currently "off," and can be switched on using their respective switch capabilities. The c2c-switch is also "off," indicating it can be activated. The TVs support input sources such as digital TV and HDMI, but no specific input source changes are requested in the command.
